channel.title: Multi-Threading on encelo.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-Threading on encelo.github.io

item.title: nCine Dev Update 22
item.description: Welcome back to another development update for the nCine, covering what has been accomplished in the first part of this year.

item.title: nCine Dev Update 21
item.description:
In this article, weâ€™ll go over the progress of the nCine throughout 2024.

OpenAL EFX

The biggest change this year has been support for the OpenAL EFX extension. You can now apply effects to any audio player, like reverb, echo, flanger, and more, and use low and high-pass filters.

item.title: nCine Dev Update 20
item.description: Lately, the development rate of the nCine slowed down a bit. I think it is normal for a project that spans so many years, and developed by a single person, to see some oscillations. This is why this article covers such a long period, a period in which there have been maybe a few new features, but important ones.
